definition: A written record or symbol used to represent a musical sound or pitch, typically found in sheet music or musical compositions. It is commonly used to indicate the duration, pitch, and timing of a specific musical tone.

examples.german: Die Note auf dem Test war sehr gut.
examples.english: The grade on the test was very good.

examples.german: Kannst du mir bitte eine Notiz machen?
examples.english: Can you please make a note for me?

examples.german: Die Musiknote war zu hoch für mich.
examples.english: The musical note was too high for me.

examples.german: Ich habe eine Note in meinem Portemonnaie gefunden.
examples.english: I found a banknote in my wallet.

examples.german: Die Lehrerin gab mir eine gute Note für meine Arbeit.
examples.english: The teacher gave me a good grade for my work.
